text: Joris Jan Schouten (North Holland, 23 September 1926 – Amersfoort, 3 July 2021) was a Dutch politician. As a member of the Catholic People's Party and Christian Democratic Appeal he served in the Senate (1980–1981; 1983–1991). Schouten died in Amersfoort on 3 July 2021, aged 94. == References == Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Catholic People's Party politicians Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Members of the Senate of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from North Holland
title: Joris Schouten
